marklogic.body:
Thought it was amusing myself. Saracens havn't been good enough this season in Europe or the league, Coughing up 13 points through mistakes and ill discipline in this game and a similar story in others. It doesn't need somebody in a post match interview to point out that.
It was clearly a pre meditated dig at the ERC as Venter was widly reported as to have withdrawn from media interviews. The fact the CEO is on the joke is clearly just another stick in the hornets nest for the organisers to have to deal with.
I still think he was harshly treated for his earlier comments even if they weren't particluarly graceious against Leinster his point about interpretations raised before the HC comp even started had not been addressed.
Still he's Off soon, Saracens billionaire backers will pay the fine and you can spend your column writing about crocked feeds... i'm going to miss Venter and his antics
